product_name: The North Face Verto Micro Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Verto Micro hoodie for women is insulated with featherweight, water-repellent down that keeps your core warm while allowing freedom of movement during alpine pursuits. Body is filled with premium 800-fill-power goose down that offers superior warmth yet remains very compressible. Water-repellent down is treated with a special finish to keep moisture at bay. Body fabric is Pertex(R) Quantum(R) GL micro-ripstop nylon, which is incredibly soft and wind-resistant, and boasts an incredibly high strength-to-weight ratio. Hood, shoulders and arm panels are nylon/elastane four-way-stretch woven fabric for easy movement. Underarm panels are stretchy FlashDry(TM) fabric that wicks moisture and speeds drying to enhance comfort. Elastic-bound hood with extra insulation in the neck extends comfort range. Sleek hem and cuff construction reduces bulk and improves fit; zippered hand pockets. The North Face Verto Micro women's hoodie stuffs into its own pocket for easy stowage.
